all.centerHTML:
MAMP Cloud

Sync & Backup your projects

Learn more

news.headline: MAMP Cloud Function available now with MAMP 4.4
news.text:
February, 2018 – MAMP Cloud Function has been released
Work on different machines, move or backup your project data.
MAMP Cloud allows you to save and load your host and database data using a cloud provider, such as Dropbox. You can easily save your host and database data in the cloud and later retrieve it on another Mac, or on the same Mac, when backing up data before making changes on your host.

news.headline: BLACK FRIDAY SALE
news.text:
November, 2017 – MAMP PRO Black Friday Sale
Buy MAMP PRO today and get a 50% discount!!!
We are doing rarely any sales so you may want to take this chance

news.headline: Mobile Testing with MAMP Viewer
news.text:
August, 2017 – MAMP Viewer App for iPhone and Android
If you want to test your sites on mobile devices, there´s now an easy way for doing so: Download MAMP Viewer on the App Store or Google Play Store.
You can make all your hosts available on your LAN without any more configuration.

news.headline: MAMP & MAMP PRO 4.1.1 out now
news.text:
February, 2017 – Version 4.1.1 is out now - comes with German localization
- Added german localisation
- Initial TouchBar support on MacBook Pro 2016
- Automatically deleting a database when deleting a host fixed
- Some functions can now only be used if the active servers are using the current configuration
- Solved PHP 7.1 configuration quirks

New components:
MySQL 5.6.35
PHP 5.6.29, 5.6.30, 7.0.14, 7.0.15 & 7.1.1
Python 2.7.13
libpng 1.6.27
phpMyAdmin 4.6.5.2
curl 7.52.1

news.headline: Happy New Year! MAMP & MAMP PRO 4.1 has just been released
news.text:
January, 2017 – Happy New Year! MAMP & MAMP PRO Version 4.1 is out now
- Exposed Memcached (the distributed memory object caching system) settings in the GUI
- Certificate chain files no longer need to have .key as a file type
- The application starts considerably faster
- Better server status detection
- Dragging & dropping assets to the sidebar does now work
- Dragging & dropping a file to a source text automatically inserts a link or path
- Text selection is preserved when switching files
- Template editor now uses the font and color settings from the Font & Colors section
- The color for placeholders in template files can now customized
- Three (adjustable) font & color presets: Standard, Plain, Dark
- Font quirks in the editor resolved
- Post-installed PHP versions will now function in CGI mode
- Pear configuration for PHP versions 7.0.x fixed
- Changes to php.ini templates allow for a more flexible configuration by the user
- Improved Ruby gem build process
- Fixed a crash in the Postfix configuration
- New components: Igbinary 2.0.0 for PHP (replaces msgpack)
- Internal optimizations and bug fixes﻿

news.headline: MAMP & MAMP PRO 4.0.6 has just been released
news.text:
October, 2016 – MAMP & MAMP PRO Version 4.0.6 is out now
- One-click activation of PHP extensions
- Nginx hosts do now accept custom statements in the location directive.
- Added the ability to use a certificate chain file for Apache SSL hosts
- Added an option to only accept TLS connections for SSL hosts
- CGI mode processes now use meaningful socket names
- Nginx now uses the correct WebStart page
- /etc/hosts is no longer accidentally reset
- Postfix configuration data is saved correctly
- Command line language interpreters use correct config file
- Command line config of language interpreters honors symbolic links
- MAMP PRO can now be controlled from the command line
- Servers restart correctly after updating a component
- Upon server failure the spinning indicator will work as expected.
- Corrected some GUI quirks
- Nameless bugs fixed
